fr.sorbonne_u.components.ports

Class AbstractInboundPort

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractPort
            • fr.sorbonne_u.components.ports.AbstractInboundPort
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ComponentInterface, OfferedCI, InboundPortI, PortI, java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractDataInboundPort, AbstractTwoWayPort, DynamicComponentCreationInboundPort, DynamicConnectionRequestInboundPort, ExampleInboundPort, IntegerFilteringInboundPort, IntegerProcessingInboundPort, IntercessionInboundPort, IntrospectionInboundPort, MapReadingInboundPort, MapWritingInboundPort, MyServiceInboundPort, PingPongInboundPort, PushControlInboundPort, ReflectionInboundPort, URIConsumerLaunchInboundPort, URIProviderInboundPort, URIProviderInboundPort, ValueProvidingInboundPort

    public abstract class AbstractInboundPort
extends AbstractPort
implements InboundPortI
    The class AbstractInboundPort partially implements an inbound port which implements the offered interface of the provider component so that the provider can be called through this port.

    Description

    A concrete port class must implement the offered interface of the component with methods that call the corresponding implementation services of their owner component, paying attention to the discipline (synchronized, ...) with which these calls must be made for the given implementation of the component.

    Invariant

     invariant      true

    Created on : 2011-11-07

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicInteger executorServiceIndex
      index of the executor service in the owner (beware that this can change over the execution of the owner if executor services are shut down dynamically).
      protected java.lang.String executorServiceURI
      URI of the executor service to be used to execute the service on the owner or null if none.
      protected java.lang.String pluginURI
      URI of the plug-in to be called in the owner or null if none.
      private static long serialVersionUID

      • AbstractInboundPort

        public AbstractInboundPort(java.lang.String uri,
                           java.lang.Class<? extends OfferedCI> implementedInterface,
                           ComponentI owner,
                           java.lang.String pluginURI,
                           java.lang.String executorServiceURI)
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        create and initialise inbound ports, with a given URI and given plug-in and executor service URI.

        Contract

         pre     uri != null && owner != null && implementedInterface != null
 pre     !owner.isPortExisting(uri)
 pre     implementedInterface.isAssignableFrom(getClass())
 pre     pluginURI == null || owner.isInstalled(pluginURI)
 pre     executorServiceURI == null || owner.validExecutorServiceURI(executorServiceURI)
 post    !isDestroyed()
 post    getPortURI().equals(uri)
 post    getOwner().equals(owner)
 post    getImplementedInterface().equals(implementedInterface)
 post    owner.isPortExisting(uri)
        Parameters:
        uri - unique identifier of the port.
        implementedInterface - interface implemented by this port.
        owner - component that owns this port.
        pluginURI - URI of the plug-in to be called in the owner or null if none.
        executorServiceURI - URI of the executor service to be used to execute the service on the component or null if none.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - todo.
